chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: Seam RESTEasy requires a CDI compliant server such as JBoss Application Server. In addition, Seam RESTEasy depends on RESTEasy. RESTEasy can either be a part of the server or bundled with the web application.

To use the Seam RESTEasy module, add seam-resteasy and seam-resteasy-api jars into the web application. If using Maven, this can be easily achieved by adding the following dependency into the application pom.xml file.
